text: Ambrishrao Satyavanrao (born 15 October 1987) is a member of the 13th Maharashtra Legislative Assembly. He represents the Aheri Assembly Constituency,http://www.elections.in/maharashtra/assembly- constituencies/aheri.html in the Gadchiroli district of Maharashtra. He belongs to the Bharatiya Janata Party. He was the State Minister of Tribal Development,forests & Gadchiroli Guardian minister for Maharashtra State Governmenthttp://www.goldenmaharashtra.in/ministries/tribal-development/ ==Early life== ==Education and early career== Raje Ambrishrao has done Business Law and HRM Level 4, University of Central England, Birmingham Business School United Kingdom, Passing year 2006.http://myneta.info/maharashtra2014/candidate.php?candidate_id=910 ==Family and personal life== Mother name - Rani rukmini devi, younger brother - kumar Avdheshrao atram ==Political career== ===Positions held=== ====Legislative==== *Member, Maharashtra Legislative Assembly - since 2014 ==See also== * Devendra Fadnavis ministry (2014–) * Make in Maharashtra ==References== Category:Members of the Maharashtra Legislative Assembly Category:Living people Category:1987 births Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2014–2019 Category:People from Gadchiroli Category:Marathi politicians Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Maharashtra
title: Raje Ambrishrao Raje Satyawan Rao Atram
